articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: Milky Way: Astronomers capture the deepest and sharpest images to date of our galaxy's black hole - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stunning new images released by the European Southern Observatory (ESO), show several stars moving around their orbit of the Milky Way's black hole, called Sagittarius A*.
articles.content:
Astronomers have revealed the 'deepest and sharpest images to date' of the region around our Milky Way galaxy's supermassive black hole.
The stunning new images, captured at various times earlier th… [+8292 chars]

articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: Former Vaccines Task Force chief raises concerns over UK vaccines strategy - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kate Bingham tells MPs the UK needs the manufacturing capacity to make its own vaccines to target coronavirus variants.
articles.content: The former chair of the U.K.s Vaccine Taskforce said Tuesday that modified vaccines will likely be needed in light of the new Omicron coronavirus variant but raised concerns over the countrys vaccine… [+1685 chars]

articles.title: Moderna to produce millions of mRNA vaccines in Australia - CNA
articles.description:
SYDNEY: US drugmaker Moderna will produce millions of mRNA vaccines a year in Australia after agreeing to set up one of its largest manufacturing facilities outside the United States and Europe.

The deal, a second such commitment in Asia Pacific by a weste…
